A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow. Original\, unique script. Great acting. Without giving spoilers\, I was surprised\, but in the end\, pleased with the storyline. Excellent addition to the Star Wars saga. If you remember\, people were divided on Empire Srikes Back at first as well. Same with this movie. I am certain history will show that this is one of the best Star Wars movies to date.
